Package gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Renderer
    This is an interface for any object that wants to render something on a Plot.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArbDepthFrameRenderer
    A class used to render hypocenters by projecting them onto a line drawn between 2 arbitrary points on the earth
    AxisRenderer
    An AxisRenderer is used to render the rectangular axis that surrounds a plot.
    BasicFrameRenderer
    Frame renderer with list of renderers to process internal frame areas
    BoxLabel
    Renderer for box labels.
    DataPointRenderer
    A renderer for individual data points.
    DataRenderer
    DataRenderer is the workhorse of the Valve plotting section.
    EllipseVectorRenderer
    This is a Renderer that draws vectors with error ellipses.
    FrameRenderer
    FrameRenderer is the base class to all of the Valve-level renderers: DataRenderer, ImageDataRenderer, HistogramRenderer, etc.
    HelicorderRenderer
    A class for rendering helicorders.
    Histogram2DRenderer
    Histogram2DRenderer is a FrameRenderer that renders a 2-D histogram.
    HistogramRenderer
    HistogramRenderer is a FrameRenderer that renders a traditional 1-D histogram.
    ImageDataRenderer
    A class that renderers an image as data.
    InvertedAxisRenderer
    Intended to be used on plots with an inverted Y axis
    InvertedFrameRenderer
    Frame renderer with inverted Y axis
    LegendRenderer
    The LegendRenderer is used to render a legend, generally in the upper-left corner of the plot.
    LineDataRenderer
    A class that renderers the contents of a LineData object.
    LineRenderer
    A renderer that renders a line TODO: extend ShapeRenderer
    MatrixRenderer
    A class that renders data in a 2D matrix.
    PointRenderer
    A Renderer that renders something at a point.
    RectangleRenderer
    A simple Renderer that renders a Rectangle2D object.
    RenderedImageDataRenderer
    See ImageDataRenderer.
    ShadowedTextRenderer
    Render text as black font with grey shadow
    ShapeRenderer
    A simple Renderer that renders a Shape object with a particular color and stroke.
    TextRenderer
    A class that renders a string at a point.
